column4: Hi. I recently bought an acer aspire one and installed Ubuntu over the OS that came bundled with the system, but i'm having some graphics related troubles. The 3d screensavers occasionally come up as wireframes, and blender has an odd hall of mirrors effect in the lower part of the window
It looks like the Acer Aspire One has Intel graphics. Tou might try asking at #blender. Those guys know about every bug that ever effected Blender.
